name: Discord Counter
body:
# Discord Counter

Moderators on 4chan sometimes like to mess with threads by including stylesheet data in their posts, which can cause the thread to not display, have a ridiculous background, etc. This script simply blocks that type of data from being loaded from inside posts.

[Install Now](https://raw.github.com/Macil/DiscordCounter/master/DiscordCounter.user.js)

## Requirements Before Installing

* Firefox with [Scriptish](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/scriptish/), Chrome/Chromium, or Opera

## Other Recommended Scripts

* [4chan X](http://mayhemydg.github.com/4chan-x/)
* [/b/ Name Sync](http://milkytiptoe.github.com/Name-Sync/)
tagline: Blocks page style modifications in moderator posts on 4chan.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
